content: HIT-IC Internally threaded sleeve Economical internally threaded sleeve for masonry fastenings (carbon steel) ### Categories: Home > Products > Fasteners > Anchor rods & elements- - - ### FEATURES:Features Can be installed flush with the surface Fastening points are reusable Applications Internally threaded solution for fastenings in various masonry materials Applications such as sun blinds ### TECHNICAL DATA: Material, corrosion: Carbon steel, zinc-plated Base materials: Masonry (hollow), Masonry (solid) PROFIS Software: No Technical Data | Material, corrosion | Carbon steel, zinc-plated | Base materials | Masonry (hollow), Masonry (solid) | PROFIS Software | No | Approvals / Test reports | ETA, ICC-ES report (masonry) | Cleaning procedures | Manual Cleaning | Type of fixing | Pre-fastening ### ITEMS- 47947 - Int thrd inserts HIT-IC 1/2 x 2 - Package Size 10 pc Package Contents: - 1x 1/2x2 Anchor sleeve assy - 47943 - Int thrd inserts HIT-IC 1/2x3-3/16 - Package Size 10 pc Package Contents: - 1x 1/2x3 3/16 Anchor sleeve assy - 47946 - Int thrd inserts HIT-IC 3/8 x 2 - Package Size 10 pc Package Contents: - 1x 3/8x2 Anchor sleeve assy - 47942 - Int thrd inserts HIT-IC 3/8x3-3/16 - Package Size 10 pc Package Contents: - 1x 3/8x3 3/16 Anchor sleeve assy - 47945 - Int thrd inserts HIT-IC 5/16 x 2 - Package Size 10 pc Package Contents: - 1x 5/16x2 Anchor sleeve assy - 47941 - Int thrd inserts HIT-IC 5/16 x 3-3/16 - Package Size 10 pc Package Contents: - 1x 5/16x3 3/16 Anchor sleeve assy
